Uses of Class
io.j4c.config.ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder

  • Packages that use ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder 
    Package Description
    io.j4c.config
    Immutable tree-like Configuration API that can be enhanced by custom SPI implementations.

    • Uses of ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder in io.j4c.config

      Methods in io.j4c.config that return ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder.add​(Supplier<ConfigSource> source)
      Adds another config source into ordered list of sources to be used to load final ConfigNode.ObjectNode.
      ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder.changesDebounce​(Duration debounceTimeout)
      Specifies debounce timeout for reloading composite config source in case any of aggregated config source(s) has changed.
      ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder.changesExecutor​(ScheduledExecutorService changesExecutor)
      Specifies ScheduledExecutorService to be used to execute config source reloading on.
      ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder.changesMaxBuffer​(int changesMaxBuffer)
      Specifies maximum capacity for each subscriber's buffer to be used to deliver config source changes.
      static ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder ConfigSources.from​(Supplier<ConfigSource>... configSources)
      Creates new instance of ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder to be used to bootstrap Composite ConfigSource instance with specified ordered list of ConfigSource instance to be used as single source of configuration.
      static ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder ConfigSources.from​(List<Supplier<ConfigSource>> configSources)
      Creates new instance of ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder to be used to bootstrap Composite ConfigSource instance with specified ordered list of ConfigSource instance to be used as single source of configuration.
      static ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder ConfigSources.load​(Config metaConfig)
      Creates new instance of ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder to be used to bootstrap Composite ConfigSource instance with ordered list of ConfigSource instance loaded from specified meta configuration.
      static ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder ConfigSources.load​(Supplier<ConfigSource>... metaSources)
      Creates new instance of ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder to be used to bootstrap Composite ConfigSource instance with ordered list of ConfigSource instance loaded from specified ordered list of meta configurations.
      ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder.mergingStrategy​(ConfigSources.MergingStrategy mergingStrategy)
      Sets strategy how to merge list of root nodes provided by list of config sources.
